verses.verse: The burden <S%H4853><s%> of the word <S%H1697><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Hadrach, <S%H2317><s%> and Damascus <S%H1834><s%> shall be the rest <S%H4496><s%> thereof: when <S%H3588><s%> the eyes <S%H5869><s%> of man, <S%H120><s%> as of all <S%H3605><s%> the tribes <S%H7626><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> shall be toward the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>
And Hamath <S%H2574><s%> also <S%H1571><s%> shall border <S%H1379><s%> thereby; Tyrus, <S%H6865><s%> and Zidon, <S%H6721><s%> though <S%H3588><s%> it be very <S%H3966><s%> wise. <S%H2449><s%>

And Tyrus <S%H6865><s%> did build <S%H1129><s%> herself a strong <S%H4692><s%> hold, <S%H4692><s%> and heaped <S%H6651><s%> up silver <S%H3701><s%> as the dust, <S%H6083><s%> and fine gold <S%H2742><s%> as the mire <S%H2916><s%> of the streets. <S%H2351><s%>

Behold, <S%H2009><s%> the LORD <S%H136><s%> will cast <S%H3423><s%> her out, and he will smite <S%H5221><s%> her power <S%H2428><s%> in the sea; <S%H3220><s%> and she shall be devoured <S%H398><s%> with fire. <S%H784><s%>

Ashkelon <S%H831><s%> shall see <S%H7200><s%> it, and fear; <S%H3372><s%> Gaza <S%H5804><s%> also shall see it, and be very <S%H3966><s%> sorrowful, <S%H2342><s%> and Ekron; <S%H6138><s%> for her expectation <S%H4007><s%> shall be ashamed; <S%H954><s%> and the king <S%H4428><s%> shall perish <S%H6><s%> from Gaza, <S%H5804><s%> and Ashkelon <S%H831><s%> shall not be inhabited. <S%H3427><s%>
And a bastard <S%H4464><s%> shall dwell <S%H3427><s%> in Ashdod, <S%H795><s%> and I will cut <S%H3772><s%> off the pride <S%H1347><s%> of the Philistines. <S%H6430><s%>

And I will take <S%H5493><s%> away <S%H5493><s%> his blood <S%H1818><s%> out of his mouth, <S%H6310><s%> and his abominations <S%H8251><s%> from between <S%H996><s%> his teeth: <S%H8127><s%> but he that remains, <S%H7604><s%> even <S%H1571><s%> he, shall be for our God, <S%H430><s%> and he shall be as a governor <S%H441><s%> in Judah, <S%H3063><s%> and Ekron <S%H6138><s%> as a Jebusite. <S%H2983><s%>

And I will encamp <S%H2583><s%> about my house <S%H1004><s%> because of the army, <S%H4675><s%> because of him that passes <S%H5674><s%> by, and because of him that returns: <S%H7725><s%> and no <S%H3808><s%> oppressor <S%H5065><s%> shall pass <S%H5674><s%> through them any more: <S%H5750><s%> for now <S%H6258><s%> have I seen <S%H7200><s%> with my eyes. <S%H5869><s%>

Rejoice <S%H1523><s%> greatly, <S%H3966><s%> O daughter <S%H1323><s%> of Zion; <S%H6726><s%> shout, <S%H7321><s%> O daughter <S%H1323><s%> of Jerusalem: <S%H3389><s%> behold, <S%H2009><s%> your King <S%H4428><s%> comes <S%H935><s%> to you: he is just, <S%H6662><s%> and having salvation; <S%H3467><s%> lowly, <S%H6041><s%> and riding <S%H7392><s%> on an ass, <S%H2543><s%> and on a colt <S%H5895><s%> the foal <S%H1121><s%> of an ass. <S%H860><s%>

And I will cut <S%H3772><s%> off the chariot <S%H7393><s%> from Ephraim, <S%H669><s%> and the horse <S%H5483><s%> from Jerusalem, <S%H3389><s%> and the battle <S%H4421><s%> bow <S%H7198><s%> shall be cut <S%H3772><s%> off: and he shall speak <S%H1696><s%> peace <S%H7965><s%> to the heathen: <S%H1471><s%> and his dominion <S%H4915><s%> shall be from sea <S%H3220><s%> even to sea, <S%H3220><s%> and from the river <S%H5104><s%> even to the ends <S%H657><s%> of the earth. <S%H776><s%>

As for you also, <S%H1571><s%> by the blood <S%H1818><s%> of your covenant <S%H1285><s%> I have sent <S%H7971><s%> forth your prisoners <S%H615><s%> out of the pit <S%H953><s%> wherein is no <S%H3808><s%> water. <S%H4325><s%>

Turn <S%H7725><s%> you to the strong <S%H1225><s%> hold, <S%H1225><s%> you prisoners <S%H615><s%> of hope: <S%H8615><s%> even <S%H1571><s%> to day <S%H3117><s%> do I declare <S%H5046><s%> that I will render <S%H7725><s%> double <S%H4932><s%> to you;

When <S%H3588><s%> I have bent <S%H1869><s%> Judah <S%H3063><s%> for me, filled <S%H4390><s%> the bow <S%H7198><s%> with Ephraim, <S%H669><s%> and raised <S%H5782><s%> up your sons, <S%H1121><s%> O Zion, <S%H6726><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> your sons, <S%H1121><s%> O Greece, <S%H3120><s%> and made <S%H7760><s%> you as the sword <S%H2719><s%> of a mighty <S%H1368><s%> man.

And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> shall be seen <S%H7200><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> them, and his arrow <S%H2671><s%> shall go <S%H3318><s%> forth <S%H3318><s%> as the lightning: <S%H1300><s%> and the LORD <S%H136><s%> God <S%H3069><s%> shall blow <S%H8628><s%> the trumpet, <S%H7782><s%> and shall go <S%H1980><s%> with whirlwinds <S%H5591><s%> of the south. <S%H8486><s%>

The LORD <S%H3068><s%> of hosts <S%H6635><s%> shall defend <S%H1598><s%> them; and they shall devour, <S%H398><s%> and subdue <S%H3533><s%> with sling <S%H7050><s%> stones; <S%H68><s%> and they shall drink, <S%H8354><s%> and make a noise <S%H6963><s%> as through wine; <S%H3196><s%> and they shall be filled <S%H4390><s%> like bowls, <S%H4219><s%> and as the corners <S%H2106><s%> of the altar. <S%H4196><s%>

And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> their God <S%H430><s%> shall save <S%H3467><s%> them in that day <S%H3117><s%> as the flock <S%H6629><s%> of his people: <S%H5971><s%> for they shall be as the stones <S%H68><s%> of a crown, <S%H5145><s%> lifted <S%H5264><s%> up as an ensign <S%H5264><s%> on his land. <S%H127><s%>

For how <S%H4100><s%> great is his goodness, <S%H2898><s%> and how <S%H4100><s%> great is his beauty! <S%H3308><s%> corn <S%H1715><s%> shall make the young <S%H970><s%> men cheerful, <S%H5107><s%> and new <S%H8492><s%> wine <S%H8492><s%> the maids. <S%H1330><s%>
